      • query

        public io.odysz.semantic.jprotocol.JMessage<io.odysz.semantic.jserv.R.QueryReq> query(java.lang.String t,
                                                                                      java.lang.String alias,
                                                                                      java.lang.String funcId,
                                                                                      int page,
                                                                                      int size)
                                                                               throws io.odysz.semantics.x.SemanticException
        Format a query request object, include all information for construct a "select" statement.
        Parameters:
        t - main table, (sometimes function category), e.g. "e_areas"
        alias - from table alias, e.g. "a"
        funcId - current function ID
        page - -1 for no paging at server side.
        size -
        Returns:
        formatted query object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        io.odysz.semantics.x.SemanticException
